name: Doggy Days
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys - Movement

Enter - Interact/Talk

This game is absolutely wonderful and you will enjoy it. Interact with every single thing in the game and find every secret. :)

Installation Instructions:

Unzip the .exe and run it. Choose a file besides the desktop to put the game folder into. It will create a folder with everything the game needs to run. Run Game.exe in the folder.

I was lazy and there's no full screen or volume control so it'll be loud so turn it down in your media control.
